comment: An arbitrary set regarded as vertices together with the set of pairs of elements of this set regarded as edges is a simple graph. (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 12-Jan-2018.) (Revised by AV, 5-Nov-2020.) (Proof shortened by AV, 10-Nov-2021.)
